meanings.definition: To engage in anal intercourse with (someone)
meanings.sent1: He was caught buggering the cat.
meanings.sent2: The couple was buggering in the alley.
meanings.sent3: Buggering in public is not appropriate.
meanings.sent4: The thief was buggering the lock with a pick.
meanings.sent5: The pirate ship buggered the stormy seas.

meanings.definition: Used to express annoyance or irritation
meanings.sent1: Buggering hell, I forgot my keys again!
meanings.sent2: Buggering traffic is making me late.
meanings.sent3: Buggering rain ruined our picnic plans.
meanings.sent4: The buggering alarm clock woke me up too early.
meanings.sent5: Buggering mosquitoes are so annoying at night.
